message.body: Thanks again for having us on Saturday! It was great meeting everyone; sorry we had to duck out. I'll be away dec. 21-26, is the 28th ok for the next lesson?
Your welcome! :) it was so great of you both to come. Really neat to meat Richard! :) lesson on 28th sounds good. Can u do 1 so that its not so hectic with
getting to the bar after? :) have great Christmas!!!
Yup, I'll plan on being there at 1230 on the 29th. Merry Christmas!
